issue.title: [CF 1072] Rune Dk Texture
issue.body:
Right now, if you change the texture of the rune (rune cooldown option), you wont be able to see the death rune, because it will use always the same texture for both.
What i would like to see ( i tryed to change it myself but im dont understand .blp ecc file enough seems) its to have different type of rune texture, since the presence icon is really bad =(

TellMeWhen isn't meant to be a fully-fleged rune tracking addon. You can use meta icons to achieve what you're asking (use a separate icon for each rune type), although it isn't optimal.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yeah i know that isnt for it, but it could be better then the others. i know that in "TellMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_runes\runes.lua" there is the texture choice, i think is line 108 there are the specific rune type texture. The problem is that even if i put another file .blp instead of those, the game cant load it. Its possible to change the path of those to others blp file to change it? the blp file should have a specific requirement?
